CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial
JUDGES: András Sajó;Françoise Tulkens;Ireneu Cabral Barreto;Nona Tsotsoria;Vladimiro Zagrebelsky
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in PERSON .
CARDINAL . The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant brought an action in compensation against his former employer before ORG . In DATE ORG partly found for him . The applicant appealed . On DATE the ORG upheld the first - instance decision . The courts relied on documentary evidence , the opinion of an auditor and testimonies of witnesses and the parties .
CARDINAL . The applicant lodged a petition for review with ORG . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant ’s petition . This decision was served on him on DATE .
